text: Boola; Enywe Abandu beshitabu, shimuli khushiosi shiosi tawe okhuula mwemie, Itaurati nende Injili, nende kano akeshibwa khwinywe okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu. Ne toto kalia akeshibwa khwiwe okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo, kalametela abanji mubo abulobi nende obukhayi. Kho olabeelele okhurulana nende Abandu abakhayi tawe
